group_1.textCenter: Okay, the next activity will be the@sports experience!
I'd like everyone to experience new things.
We're going to divide the students into groups and@have them try out sports they're not familiar with.

group_1.textLeft: It looks like our group is archery.

group_1.textRight: Have you ever tried it, Hotori?

group_1.textLeft: I've had a lot of practice shooting a bow...
By imitating Dragoon White...!

group_1.textRight: White...? Who's that?

group_1.textLeft: He's one of the characters in my favorite@action hero show...
And he fights with a bow...!

group_1.textRight: I see...
I'm sorry, I don't know anything about that.

group_1.textLeft: N-no, I'm the one who's sorry...

group_1.textRight: Anyway, sounds like none of us have done it@before.
Let's try to copy the way the instructor did it.
.........[wait:0.8][chara:800200:lipSynch_1]Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Wh-what's wrong?

group_1.textRight: ...It's so stiff that I can't pull it at all.
The instructor made it look so easy...
I'll give it a try too.

group_1.textLeft: ...How is it?

group_1.textRight: ...I can't do it either. Would you like to try it,@Hotori?

group_1.textLeft: O-okay...!
Eeeh...!
(...I-I can't...my fingers hurt...)

group_1.textRight: No luck either, huh... Should we give up...?

group_1.textLeft: (...No! It's too early to give up...!)
There should be a page here in the@Strategy Guide...

group_1.narration: Dragon Knight Squad Draranger@Episode #12 - Roaring Dragon's Fist!@Dragoon Red's line:
"Don't give up!@Persevere and push onward just one more step!@Sometimes that single step is all it takes to@overcome a barrier...!"

group_1.textLeft: .........[wait:0.8][chara:304101:lipSynch_1:eyeClose_0]I'm going to try one more time...!

group_1.textRight: Oh, sure...

group_1.textLeft: Mmmmmngh...!

group_1.textRight: A-amazing... You're pulling it back a bit...!

group_1.textLeft: Here it goes...!

group_1.textRight: Ah... It flew! That was really amazing, Hotori...!

group_1.textLeft: Ehehe... I missed the target, though.
(I...I did it...! Maybe all my hard work has paid off!)
Huh, Rion...?

group_1.textRight: Sounds like something's going on over there.@Wanna go check it out?

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah...
Amazing! You hit the target again!

group_1.textRight: Well, it's pretty easy.

group_1.textCenter: (All I tried to do was fire it...)
(B-but... The old me couldn't have done it.)
(If I keep going like this, one step at a time...)

group_1.textRight: Oh! Hotoriiiin!
You must've gotten lonely and came to see me.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Th-that's not why I'm here...

group_1.textRight: Oh yeah, did you hear? About tonight.

group_1.textLeft: ...Tonight?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, tonight's activities are being kept@under wraps, but...
I heard that we're actually going to have a@test of courage!

group_1.textLeft: A test...of courage...?

group_1.textRight: That's right! We've got to do it, Hotorin!

group_1.textLeft: A test of courage...with ghosts...
*Sob*... I-impossible...ghosts are the@one thing...completely impossible for me...

group_1.textCenter: It's a dream I've had since I was little...@I don't want to give up!
